AZURE_CREDENTIALS.description: Azure Service Principal credentials for authentication
AZURE_CREDENTIALS.how_to_get: Create a Service Principal in Azure Portal > App registrations > New registration > Certificates & secrets

AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID.how_to_get: Azure Portal > Subscriptions > Copy Subscription ID

REGISTRY_USERNAME.how_to_get: Azure Portal > Container Registry > Access keys > Username

REGISTRY_PASSWORD.how_to_get: Azure Portal > Container Registry > Access keys > Password
